description:
UPDATE: as of 5/23/2014 we have updated the kit to include:45 X 330ohm Resistors, 45X 10K Resistors, 2X Big 12mm Buttons, Heatsink for Raspberry Pi - Set of 3 Heat Sinks, 10X Yellow LED,
10X Red LEDKit ContentRaspberry Pi - Model B (512 MB / Revision 2)Raspberry Pi Enclosure Case (Clear)4GB SD Card pre-loaded with NOOB -- Which has the following software pre-installed -- Raspbian -- OpenELEC -- Arch -- RaspBMC-- RISC OS -- PidoraUSB Power Supply with Micro USB Cable6FT High Quality HDMI CableWireless Wifi Adapter Realtek 8188CU Same Chip used by the Edimax EW-7811Un400-Tie-point breadboard (white)65 Jumper Wires -- 45 pcs--100mm,  10 pcs--150mm, 5 pcs--200mm, 5  pcs--250mmUSB to TTL Serial CableGPIO Ribbon Cable with Breakout board45 X 330 Resistors45X 10K Resistors2X Big 12mm ButtonsHeatsink for Raspberry Pi - Set of 3 Heat Sinks10X Yellow LED10X Red LEDNOTE: The SD Card may appear to be a smaller capacity when you test it on your computer, but it's 100% guaranteed to be 8GB.The reason it appears to be smaller is because of the partitions placed on the card once the software is installed.UPDATE:USB POWER ADAPTER has been updated to 2 AMP (2000 mA)-- Enough to power a USB keyboard, the included wifi adapter, and wireless mouse.Wifi Adapter has been updated to the Realtek 8188CU--  Same Chip used by the Edimax EW-7811Un
title: Raspberry Pi Ultimate Starter Kit -- Includes Raspberry Pi Board + 11 Essential Accessories
